name: Road Signs
purpose: To allow traffic turning left, to do so (if it can be done without interfering with cross traffic) without stopping.
action: If you intend to carry straight on, bring your vehicle to a standstill behind the stop line. When turning left, yield to all traffic, which is close enough to pose a hazard. Proceed only when it is safe.
description: Learn about all the road signs controls that you will need to know to pass the K53 learners test.

name: Road Rules
purpose: To allow traffic turning left, to do so (if it can be done without interfering with cross traffic) without stopping.
action: If you intend to carry straight on, bring your vehicle to a standstill behind the stop line. When turning left, yield to all traffic, which is close enough to pose a hazard. Proceed only when it is safe.
description: Learn about all the rules of the road that you will need to know to pass the K53 learners test.

name: Controls
purpose: To allow traffic turning left, to do so (if it can be done without interfering with cross traffic) without stopping.
action: If you intend to carry straight on, bring your vehicle to a standstill behind the stop line. When turning left, yield to all traffic, which is close enough to pose a hazard. Proceed only when it is safe.
description: Learn about all the vehicle controls that you will need to know to pass the K53 learners test.
